products.name: Duck painting
products.description: Add a touch of avian elegance to your home with this beautiful painting of a stately duck. The perfect decor for any bird enthusiast or art lover. Limited stock available.

products.name: Christmas plushie
products.description: Snuggle up to the holiday spirit with this adorable white and red Christmas plushie. Its soft, huggable design will make you smile all season long. Great as a gift or decoration.

products.name: Duck ball
products.description: Turn your Christmas tree into a winter wonderland with this duck-inspired Christmas ball ornament. Hang it up and let the quirkiness of the duck head brighten your holidays.

products.name: Duck plushie
products.description: Get ready for a quacking good time with this big, cuddly duck plushie wearing a Christmas hat. A festive addition to your home and a perfect companion for the holiday season.

products.name: Tall cake
products.description: Indulge in the deliciously tempting world of this towering cake. With layers of rich chocolate and a creamy crown, it's a treat that's as visually stunning as it is mouthwateringly good.

products.name: Dog outfit
products.description: Dress your small dog in festive style with this cute Christmas-themed dog outfit. It's the paw-fect way to make your furry friend part of the holiday festivities.

products.name: Fancy glass
products.description: Raise a toast in style with this very tall and fancy champagne glass featuring intricate ice crystal inlays. Elevate your celebrations and make every sip special.

products.name: Thin champagne bottle
products.description: Pop the cork and ring in the new year with this slender champagne bottle. Its sleek design is perfect for elegant gatherings and unforgettable moments.

products.name: Cake cover
products.description: Preserve the beauty of your small cakes with this intricate box and cover. Its design adds a touch of elegance and ensures that your cakes remain fresh and delightful.

products.name: Candle set
products.description: Create a cozy and festive atmosphere with this delightful candle set. Each candle comes wrapped in Christmas-like red bands and a white fluffy sock, adding a touch of holiday charm.

products.name: Creepy dog statue
products.description: Meet this quirky and endearing small statue of a creepy but cute dog. Its colorful stomach, white head, brown nose, and cheeky tongue sticking out make it a unique conversation starter.
